biography: Born John Albert LaForme on June 1, 1966 in Lowell, Massachusetts, Vince worked as a forklift operator and male stripper prior to appearing in adult films in 1994. He eventually moved up the ranks to directing (starting with Odyssey Group Video in 1996) and producing his own films and co-founded several production companies including Voyeur Media  and Red Light District Video. In addition to X-rated film work, he also frequently appeared in soft-core cable films and TV shows using various aliases starting in the mid-90s.
name: Vince Vouyer
